description: Reference documentation for PFC syntax elements and model properties. These are not standalone commands but language elements used within commands.

contact-models.name: Contact Models
contact-models.description: Contact model properties (kn, ks, fric, pb_*, etc.)
contact-models.summary: 5 built-in models: linear, linearcbond, linearpbond, hertz, rrlinear

range-elements.name: Range Elements
range-elements.description: Range filtering syntax (position, cylinder, group, id, etc.)
range-elements.summary: Geometric, attribute, and logical range filters

notes: References are syntax elements used within commands, not standalone commands
